name: Falcon Allen & Mike's Really Cool Backcountry Ski Bo
categories: Allen& Mike's Really Cool Backcountry Ski Bo
description: Tried-and-true tricks and useful tips about backcountry skiing and winter camping from National Outdoor Leadership School instructors with years of experience. Learn how to choose equipment, avoid hazards, build snow shelters, stay safe, and minimize your impact on the wilderness. Illustrated.
